name: Number One Rich
description:
Gameplay

This game adopts a real-time gameplay suitable for eight players to play board games. Initially, all players have certain amount of coins and resources. The players move forward determined by rolling dice. They can buy land, build buildings where they stop, and have to pay rent when passing other players' land. The first player to bankrupt other players wins first place.

Game Features:

●Light Rogue Elements
Each round of the game generates a brand new map, making every roll of the dice shrouded in excitement.

●Battle Royale Gameplay
Bankruptcy means elimination; players must do their utmost to achieve victory.

●Real-time gameplay
Compared with turn-based games, real-time gameplay has a faster pace and more excitement. In "Number One Rich" strategic decision-making is more important than hand speed.

●Continuous updates
Join community activities to help us shape the game! You can provide your own opinions and discuss your ideas with other players and developers.

Online Game

This game is an online multiplayer game where players can play online with friends and match with strangers in-game.

●Online (battle against real players) and play online with your friends
●Single Player (battle against AI players)

If you like board games such as Monopoly, Auto Chess, Hearthstone Tavern Brawl, then you will also enjoy the Number One Rich.

Come and experience the first and only real-time Monopoly game on the market together.
